info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 6:26PM EDT until August 24 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MANATEE...CENTRAL CHARLOTTE...SOUTHWESTERN DESOTO... NORTHWESTERN LEE AND SOUTHEASTERN SARASOTA COUNTIES... At 626 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Charlotte County Airport to 6 miles southeast of Punta Gorda to Cape Coral, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, North Port, Punta Gorda, Burnt Store Marina, Murdock, Page Park, Punta Rassa, East Dunbar and Fort Myers Villas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
